about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of exhilarating ball-matching puzzles in "Ikoka Game." It's a game for all ages and genders, offering a simple yet deeply challenging experience. Dive into a captivating journey of strategy and competition, perfect for quick gaming sessions.

Features:

Simple Rules, Deep Challenges: "Ikoka Game" is easy to start with, yet it offers a depth of strategy that will captivate you. Rearrange balls to aim for high scores. From beginners to seasoned players, everyone can enjoy the puzzle experience.

A Competitive Scoring System: Compete with others by achieving high scores in a game that combines fun and strategy. Can you reach the top of the leaderboards?

Ideal for Quick Gaming Sessions: Whether you have a 5-minute break or a long waiting time, "Ikoka Game" is right at your fingertips. Start the game and enjoy stress relief and brain training simultaneously.

This game will stimulate your mind and provide moments of delight. Dive into the charm of ball-matching puzzles, compete with friends and family, and aim for the top of the leaderboards. And that's just the beginning! We have exciting plans to expand the graphics and gameplay in future releases.

"Ikoka Game" will be available on Steam starting November 7th. Give it a try on release day.
